entry.title: Starting A Blog Hosted On Github Pages

link.title: Starting A Blog Hosted On Github Pages

entry.summary: My first ever blog post Finally! After a year long intense planning and no action, I managed to finally setup my own blog from scratch, using Github pages. A simple question that everyone might ask is “why not write blogs on WordPress or Medium just like everyone else?”. Well, multiple reasons; it has bloated code that you can’t get rid-off, unnecessary targeted ads and more importantly, if yo...
